website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive and handy, this portable option comes in several fun colors.
pros: Made for the pocket (no hook included)
cons: A few owners complain of leaks
Be sure to read instructions carefully to help avoid this

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great. Make sure to read the insructions
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Make sure to read the insructions, follow them and your pocket will not get wet. In case you don't read instructions for such a simple product, and do read reviews B4 buying....pull out the lining, wet under fawcet, ring out the excess water leaving liner damp, stuff liner back into outer pocket. Put in pocket and head for the course. I use this every time I play a round. Stuff the dirty golf ball in, work it around a few seconds and remove a now clean golf ball. Has never failed to do its job yet. I will definitely buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: deadeye

customer_reviews.title: No more dirty hands and pockets!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than spitting on the ball and cleaning it with my hand or the inside of my pocket! I don't like carrying a towel on the green, so when when I was looking at bag towels, this was listed under customer's who view this item also view these products. Never knew these existed. It fit's comfortably in my back pocket and the waterproof lining works great, and it stays wet for 18 holes. I turn it inside out after each round to let it dry out. I use it 2-3 times a week and once a month or so while I have it inside out, I hand wash the inner lining with dish soap.
customer_reviews.author: G. Brown

customer_reviews.title: great pocket golf ball cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for 8-10 years and they are great to keep in a pocket and use to clean my golf ball when I reach the putting green. When new, they are excellent. Over time the inside material wears thin and the moisture may begin to soak through at the top and into my pocket. That is the signal it is time to replace it -- so I ordered 3 this time.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: No wet pocket
customer_reviews.text: Most of the ball clearers you carry with cause your back pocket to become wet. This produce keeps the moisture in the water and not in your back pocket. Because I have moisture in the pocket I can quickly clean my ball on the green while I am waiting for my turn. Best product I have found for this purpose. I buy these for gifts for golf buddies, always appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Reid

customer_reviews.title: Leaks horribly, not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage! It is NOT waterproof, water seeps out of it like a sponge. Leaks water out no matter how careful you store it in your pocket. If you are buying because they say it won’t leak all over your pants, don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.author: R. Young

customer_reviews.title: Grrat in theory
customer_reviews.text: Leaks. Can’t put hardly any water in it to clean golf balls without soaking your pocket. If you put just enough water where it won’t leak, it’s not enough to do what it’s designed for. Two stars because I can hang it on the bag and use it but I already have a towel. I can’t recommend the product I received.
customer_reviews.author: Colt Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Fuctional and small
customer_reviews.text: A few reviews said this leaks into your pocket and gets it wet. If you flip the liner inside out, wet it, then wring it out, it has plenty of moisture and doesn't leak. I even used it 2 days in a row without wetting the liner again and it still works perfectly. It's small enough to fit in any normal size pocket. I kept it in my back pocket and sitting in a cart didn't get my pants wet or feel like it got in the way. Much better than bringing a towel with you to the green.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for lady golfers
customer_reviews.text: I love this pocket ball washer so much that I’ve purchased three and gifted them to friends. This is especially helpful for lady golfers because golf courses rarely put ball washer stations near the red tee boxes. I guess they worry the men will hit them when they tee off ;) I add a few drops of water before starting a round and it’s perfect for cleaning my ball. I use it most on the greens if it has been rainy. I turn it inside out and throw it in the washing machine to clean it between rounds. Great price and it does exactly what you need. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M

customer_reviews.title: No more spitting on balls and wiping on your shirt ;)
customer_reviews.text: Great ball cleaner. Small in size which fits easily in back pocket. Some complain that it leaks through, which is correct, but that is because people are putting too much water in it. The inside pouch just needs to be moist enough to clean the dirt/grass stains and you won't experience any moisture seeping though.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Good for drying off your golf ball.
customer_reviews.text: I like how this fits in your back pocket. I really just functions like a rag to dry your ball, it doesn’t clean the ball as far as I experienced. It definitely will dry your ball. The ball doesn’t go in or come out easily. I’m happy with it drying the ball but it’s not what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Deck

customer_reviews.title: pocket soaker
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof membrane. I don't think so. My pocket was completely wet the first two times I used it. And yes, I put it in my pocket opening side up. Other than that it works almost as well as the Ballbrite cleaner that I have attached to my bag. I wish they made a pocket version of the Ballbrite cleaner so you can easily clean your ball while you're on the green.
customer_reviews.author: jonny80s

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect so far after a dozen usage.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect so far after a dozen usage. I personally always seem to leave a damp towel on green after cleaning ball and throwing towel to the side which drives me crazy. This cleans my balls great on the green and easy to just put it in my back pocket after words so I never loose it. Highly recommend so far. Will update if any issues after using it several months longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective.
customer_reviews.text: It cleans off light dirt scuffs, but quickly becomes dirty so it won't clean you golf ball well after 2 or 3 holes. You're going to have a wet spot on your pants, even when the ball cleaner is just slightly damp inside.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mike

customer_reviews.title: more or less  - a sponge
customer_reviews.text: This does not stay dry on the exterior, whatsoever. The claim that the outside of the pouch will be dry is totally false. It cleans golf balls OK but you hands, pants, whatever else comes in contact with it will get damp.
customer_reviews.author: MLSLSD

customer_reviews.title: Good product, always use it now
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Don’t play without it anymore. Quickly Clean my ball when I get to the green after I mark my ball and eye the line. Gets that dirt and grass off so you aren’t distracted while putting.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be pretty good so far.
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions and wrung out the excess water. Grabbed a few balls I had that were dirty and it cleaned them right up. Happy guy here. 4 stars because the instructions were kind of vague.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Drager

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a couple of these, to me this is a must have, so easy to use. great product. Fits nicely in your pocket, just add a little water to it during your round once or twice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof in any way shape or form. Carefully added small amount of water to inside. Placed it in my pocket (topside up). My pocket was s soaking wet. Good thing I was wearing navy blue shorts or I would have had a large wet spot on my shorts. It does clean the ball well. At least it has one good point.
customer_reviews.author: White

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a friend that showed me this and I immediately ordered one. I am very happy I did. It performs exactly as I wanted it to. Simple design, great execution. You don't have to get it soaked, just enough water to make the inside wet, and then it retains the moisture through 18 holes. I just carry it in my pocket and then pull it out when I mark my ball on the green, and voila I have a clean happy ball to putt. I would certainly recommend this to other golfers, and I have.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome and for the price you can't beat it. I was always finding myself on the green cleaning my ball and needing a moist towel to remove dirt. With this thing it's small fits in my pocket so I don't have to carry a towel around and stays moist the whole round. Will buy a spare one!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAdam

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: I have a more expensive ball towel and prefer this one. It fits in the pocket and the inside stays wet for the round. However I do add water when possible. The outside isn't dry after wringing but it isn't soaking wet either. It's not wet enough to soak through clothing although you may have a small spot depending on how you wringing it. I prefer this one over my other towel because I can carry it in my pocket while the other towel I have clipped to my bag and always forget it when on the greens. Very good product. I even bought some for my regular playing partners.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnnn

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to My Golf Game
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to my golf game. Putting with a dirty ball sucks, but I hated dragging a damp towel out to the green with me. I have tried the Ballzee cleaners in the past & thought they were OK, but the ProActive Green Go Pocket Ball Washer is fantastic. It takes a couple rounds to figure out the right amount of water to use so the cleaner has enough moisture to do its job while not so much that your pocket gets wet, but you'll love this product after you get that worked out!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: Meant to be carried in your pocket for cleaning golf ball on the green. If it has sufficient water to clean ball, it will likely wet your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This little pocket washer is great....just pour a bit of water into it and stick it in your pocket and it's great for cleaning your ball on the green without carrying a towel.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this pocket golf ball washer for just over a month. It is all that it is advertised. By following the instructions, cleans the ball and doesn't leak or dampen your pocket. After each use, I invert the inner liner and rinse it off and let it dry completely before using again. No bad smells, etc. Haven't had the need to launder yet, but don't expect any issues. Highly recommende
customer_reviews.author: dough809

customer_reviews.title: Ball Washer
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says. Seemed a bit smaller than what I expected when I got it in the mail, however, I'm glad it is the size it is because it fits perfectly in your pocket. Any bigger, and it would be uncomfortable. I turned mine inside out, thoroughly wet it under the faucet and then wrung it out. That was the perfect amount of moisture for 18 holes on Sunday night, and another 9 holes on Monday afternoon before I inverted it again to wash it off.
customer_reviews.author: GWBuffalo

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best "cheap" golf stuff I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best "cheap" golf stuff I have ever bought. Just pour little water in it to make the cloth damp enough, put it in your back pocket and use it quickly on the greens. I used to always clean the balls with my hand when on the green since i don't like the idea of walking back to the buggy or small towel attached with a carabiner to my belt. This is a clean solution. I bought couple of extra to give some friends on the course.
customer_reviews.author: ubp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I always forget my ball towel at my bag and end up picking up my ball and having nothing to clean it with. No longer. With the Green Go I just get the inside wet, wring it out a bit and stick it in my back pocket where I have easy access to it for the round. It works perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. in San Jose

customer_reviews.title: Plus it does a very good job of cleaning the mud and grass off the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this ball cleaner. It stays wet on the inside and does not leak or get your pocket wet. It's very hand when you walk up to the green, pick up your ball without walking over to the ball cleaner. Plus it does a very good job of cleaning the mud and grass off the ball. Well worth it, especially if you include it in an order that qualifies for free shipping
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Clifton

customer_reviews.title: good ball cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Decent ball cleaner. the bad thing is when you first fill it with water, it drips into your pocket. Otherwise it cleans a golf ball good
customer_reviews.author: A. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of spitting on a towel or directly onto the golf ball to get the ball clean once it was on the green. I'm sure the spitting isn't pleasant to watch for other golfers either. I use this pocket sized product with a little bit of water inside and I can get the golf ball clean and ready for putting in just a few seconds. As long as you don't overload the product with water, you won't experience any leaks. If it does leak, turn it inside out and squeeze out the excess and it will be just fine again. I'm never going back to the towel to clean my golf balls!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Small and cleans your ball
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I recommend wetting the inside before use. Small and cleans your ball.
customer_reviews.author: Carduccigirl

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the 1st time on the golf course & it worked great. It fit comfortably in my back pocket & the inside stayed wet, while the outside was dry. My golf buddies saw me using it & asked where I got it? They will be buying one too.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Espino

customer_reviews.title: Works in both sunshine and rain.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could've gotten it for free but works great. Have used it in both dry weather & the rain. Worked well both removing dirty when soaking the inside and using on hot days, while in comparison keeping it dry and using it to clean mud & water off the ball when I played in the rain. As others have mentioned, just make sure to pull the pouch lining out before saturating it with water or it will leak.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: No more licking balls!!
customer_reviews.text: This handy gadget works GREAT for cleaning your ball on the green. It fits perfectly in your pocket and gets the job done. I play in a women's league and we are always going straight to the red tees while the ball washers are back at the whites. My golf partner is jealous of my clean balls, so I'll be ordering another on for her!! I highly recommend this washer :)
customer_reviews.author: Mamadubbs

customer_reviews.title: Easy and it works
customer_reviews.text: It works. Gets the golf ball clean in seconds. Don't put too much water into it, it will seep to the outside. Just needs a couple drops.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Evers

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT keep this in your pocket!!!
customer_reviews.text: They advertise that the inside stays wet, and the outside stays completely dry. They even reccomend that you carry it in your pocket. Go ahead and give this a try amd let me know how wet your pants get, lol. Completely false statement on their part...
customer_reviews.author: Nox

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and is well constructed. However, I find it to be too tight. The ball goes in but do not rotate or spin. Since the ball does not easily move it does not easily clean the ball.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wherry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ball Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as intended. Played 3 or 4 rounds and so far my pocket stays dry. Ive attached my ball marker to it because its obviously only used when I mark my ball on the green.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gilwee

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Bought it for my husband for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought it for my husband for Christmas. All of his buddies want one now. Has not leaked in his pocket.
customer_reviews.author: AmbiKat

customer_reviews.title: Efficient Product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve forever previously used my finger to clean my golf balls but this product eliminates that and works well. The only thing is that it requires for to take it out of my pocket in order to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: squinn88

customer_reviews.title: Nearly great
customer_reviews.text: Does a decent job. Only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is that it does get you pocket a little wet.
customer_reviews.author: M. McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Sink more putts!
customer_reviews.text: Great product to have on the green. Fits in your pocket and does a great job of cleaning the ball. Sink more putts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pocket size ball washing accessory
customer_reviews.text: I love this golf accessory. I can't count on ball washer on the golf course because of several reasons: not every hole has one, bone dry, or busted. Having this in the pocket, I can clean golf ball whenever and wherever I can. Compared to the other ball cleaning accessory I used to have, this is much more durable. After I pour a couple teaspoon of water, it is moist for a round of 18 hole. The trick for long lasting is to pull it inside out for drying after completing the round. Stuff it back in and pour some water, you are ready for another day of golf.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and does a good job cleaning my ball.
customer_reviews.author: kathy handy

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful ball washer. Very convenient when the courses not longer fill their ball washers in late Fall and Winter. I did get the outside wet so my pants got wet...wish it had a hook so I could attach to bag instead of putting in my pocket BUT it did the job...no muddy balls in Fall and Winter.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Mated golfballs are very difficult to get in and out
customer_reviews.text: Its ok. Mated golfballs are very difficult to get in and out. Slick material golf balls work best.
customer_reviews.author: Expect the Best

customer_reviews.title: Must have for every golfer
customer_reviews.text: The course I usually play at doesn't have any ball washer stands. So I use to bring around a damp cloth and that's if I remembered! Anyway, this pocket ball washer is a gem, fits in your pocket and doesn't leak or wet your pants. When you mark your ball, just pop the ball in, rub and voila you're ready to putt with your clean ball. Cleaning the pocket washer is just as easy, just flip the ball pocket inside out, wash and hang to dry. At $4.00 this is something every golfer should have.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super awesome for people who walk! Always can easily clean my ball before I putt and not have to walk the way up from the tips to the ball washer. Great little gadget
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Wet pockets
customer_reviews.text: For what it's worth, this item will make your pocket wet. You have to keep adding water to keep it moist enough to clean a ball which then wicks out into you pocket. It is not big enough to clean the ball well and the opening for the ball is very tight. You are better off just keeping a wet towel on your golf bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad little golf toy for cheap
customer_reviews.text: The pocket washer is a cool idea. It actually does fit very easily into your pocket and it actually does not leak (at least it hasn't yet!). It doesn't do the best job cleaning the ball, but at least it gets it moist enough where it's easy to use a towel to wipe it all off. Certainly not as effective as the traditional on-course ball washers, but it comes in handy and is useful for me since I play at a course that does a very poor job maintaining the on-course ball washers.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Mentry

customer_reviews.title: Ok. Probably would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to bu there are better ones out there. Kind of a tight fit for the ball. Overall it cleans the ball
customer_reviews.author: Gr82bavol

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great especially for when courses dont have ball washers. Just wish it had a loop to clip it on my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chris hays

customer_reviews.title: The ball washer is okay, but you really have ...
customer_reviews.text: The ball washer is okay, but you really have to becareful when wetting the inside or you will have a wet pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, compact and easy
customer_reviews.text: Does as advertised, cleans ball easily and you don't have to carry a towel to the green. Small, slips in pocket and only the inside is wet. Perfect solution. Had used a different product for years, a round thing with a fabric inside. This one is actually smaller and does not drip at all.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and impressive. Nice to have in your pocket on the green
customer_reviews.author: Kyle W

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could attach it to my bag
customer_reviews.text: Wish that it had a loop to clip it to my golf bag. It works great but need to keep it in my pocket or on the golf cart while I'm playing. Good product but due to that, it could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Seth P.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient little tool
customer_reviews.text: It is very convenient and easier than using my towel all he time i Just wish I could wash the inside out as it retains all the grass cuttings in it so once you have clean the ball it is shiny but full of grass cuttings from yesterdays round.
customer_reviews.author: Ball012

customer_reviews.title: It works well!
customer_reviews.text: Wet the ball a little bit before you insert into the pocket. It has a micro fiber material for the inside. Push the ball around for a few seconds, and it does remove most ball strike marks, and dirt. Obviously does not remove physical gouges. All in all, not a bad deal, it works well!
customer_reviews.author: Bobo

customer_reviews.title: Good golf tool.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty effective at cleaning your golfball. a little bulky in the pocket if you don't like a lot of stuff on you when playing. Overall works better then a towel which I end up leaving at my clubs or if i do remember to bring it to the green, leaving it it on the green! I also like the Balls-eze which is comparable and a tad less bulky in the pocket. It however can leave your pants damp where the ProActive will not.
customer_reviews.author: Dules

customer_reviews.title: Nice pocket ball wash/holder.
customer_reviews.text: Nice pocket ball wash. Works really well if you have the right pocket in your shorts for it. With a ball inside it, it's a little large if you have tees and a divot tool. One thing to keep in mind, after you add water, try to wring out as much water that you can, or you could get a little damp from it.
customer_reviews.author: Carl H

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to your golf accessories.
customer_reviews.text: This is a clever addition to your golf bag, or pocket. I carry 2 golf balls when I play. I put one in the pocket ball washer and then use it on the next hole, and keep switching. This saves the need to use the course ball washers.
customer_reviews.author: Dapper Dan

customer_reviews.title: I love it, I've bought so many of these because ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I've bought so many of these because every time someone sees me use it, they want one!
customer_reviews.author: jensetsfire

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes this product. Be sure and read instructions as to how to use this effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Joie

customer_reviews.title: Clean balls
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my cart to push the total for free shipping. It is a pleasant surprise. I just turn it inside out and dip in water. Then put wet side in and carry in my pocket. It cleans the ball well. At the end of the round, I turn it inside out again to let it dry. Much more convenient than carrying a damp towel onto the green to clean your ball.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Clean ball rolls and flies truer.
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time. Fits nicely in pocket and cleans up the ball fast, without worrying about leaving the towel laying on the ground because you did`nt have to bring one with you onto the green too clean the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Golf Nut

customer_reviews.title: Wish List Item
customer_reviews.text: Great stocking stuff for my golfing son. It was an item from his wish list. I couldn''t miss ordering. Price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Hallenius

customer_reviews.title: Need to get a clip to attach to bag.
customer_reviews.text: It works well. Would rather have a way to hang it on the bag. Too worried that it would leak in to me pocket.
customer_reviews.author: scott hcer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Every golfer needs one of these. You get it damp, keep it in your pocket or golf bag (it stays damp) and use it to clean off your ball as you go. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: and there's a lot of that when you're continually using it to clean dirty balls.
customer_reviews.text: It cleans the ball really well. I chose the pink color and wish I had chosen the black. The pink shows all the dirt......and there's a lot of that when you're continually using it to clean dirty balls.
customer_reviews.author: Kim D. Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great way to clean your golf ball after you mark it on the green. Font gave to wait until the next tee box.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Forziat

customer_reviews.title: Good Item worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: Good Item worth the buy. Keeps my balls clean well. I like to putt with a clean ball.
customer_reviews.author: Flycobra

customer_reviews.title: Foufr
customer_reviews.text: Sounded like a good idea but was hard to use
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Alan Helbling Sr

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Cleans up easily in the washing machine. Well pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TJ the Tool Guy

customer_reviews.title: Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Just wet the inside slightly and stick it in your pocket so you always have something to clean the golf ball even on the greens. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: Ray98

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: not big enough for intended use. overpriced! if mfg cares, size should be about 6" X 6". wish i hadn't bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Kent Beckman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! fits nicely in the pocket.. retains the moisture to be able to clean the ball when needed.. and the balls does come out looking fresh.. it does not make the pocket linings wet.. so it does what is expected of it and my buddies are already lining up to get one.. way better the taking a towel to the green...
customer_reviews.author: Deepcolour

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, just wet and squeeze the extractable interior ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, just wet and squeeze the extractable interior and you get a clean ball in all your round with dry pants
customer_reviews.author: Leonel

customer_reviews.title: Much easier than a towel and it fits in your pocket!
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure if this would work, but it works great and I use it every time out. I always un-clipped a towel from my cart to wipe my ball on the green. This cleaner fits nicely in a pocket and takes just seconds to clean the ball. Much easier than the towel and far less cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Ok in a jam
customer_reviews.text: All he dirt is trapped on the inside, so the bag needs to be cleaned after one use
customer_reviews.author: Dan The Man

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for a good price
customer_reviews.text: When I remember to wet the lining and put this in my pocket, it is a great little item to have once you get to the green. There has been so many time prior that my ball would be covered with mud or other debris and I wouldn't have any way to clean it. This does the job very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: My Husband Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I married the man that is the hardest person in the world to buy for. I hit a home run with this. He loves it. Usually I get "that's nerdy golf stuff" from him, but not this time. He has already taken it to the golf course to give it a try. It's a winner all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Ann S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These work great, just add a little water and put it in your pocket, no need to carry a towel onto the green.
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning balls.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Was surprised how easily and quickly it will clean your balls.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good idea
customer_reviews.text: You have to take care the amount of water you add to the pouch. Too much will leak through. The amount necessary doesn't seem efficient to clean balls. works most efficient when run through a ball washer, and then rubbed down with the green go.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Gave as gifts to golfing buddies after they saw mine ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gifts to golfing buddies after they saw mine.
customer_reviews.author: RMAC

customer_reviews.title: great little pocket ball cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as gifts for outgoing officers in our ladies' league. They are quite compact and look like a great way to get that extra sand and grass off your ball without carrying a towel around. The price is affordable and they make a great token gift or something for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Peterson

customer_reviews.title: good idea; but!
customer_reviews.text: Fits in pocket easily, should be great around the green to clean ball before a putt. Something about the shape doesn't work for cleaning. When placing a ball inside to clean, I couldn't turn it or move it to actually clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Fell

customer_reviews.title: Essential kit
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a lark, now consider it an essential part of my kit. We play early morning quite often, and it's great to be able to wipe the ball clean on the green without carrying a bulky towel, etc. I usually keep a spare ball in it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Garbelotti

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have
customer_reviews.text: Ball cleaner is great to use before putting on the green, makes it easier to put with a clean golf ball. Easy to use and clean, very handy to have. Fast shipping, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: muskyhunter36

customer_reviews.title: buy this thing now. I love it.
customer_reviews.text: best thing ever if you like putting with a clean ball. I never use the on course ball washers anymore. it has never made my pocket wet. it holds water well and cleans a ball in a flash. i absolutely recommend this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning ball around the green
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning ball around the green. No need to go to the cart for your towel. It is conveniently kept in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: fander

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, Pour in some water and slip it into my pants pocket. Work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Get yourself a micro fiber towel instead !
customer_reviews.text: Your pocket does get wet .Used it one time very unhappy with purchase. Went back to carrying a wet towel to the green to clean my ball with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... when I am on the greens and it works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could clean my ball when I am on the greens and it works like a charm. great product would definitely suggest this to others.
customer_reviews.author: kyle leatherock

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Gadget
customer_reviews.text: This pocket Ball Washer is an inexpensive add-on item if you're a golfer and need something to round off your Amazon order. it's also a handy little gadget for those "not so perfect" golf days in Western New York! It beats having to carry a towel around with you! BTW.....It also would make a nice gift card holder or favor at a golf banquet!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joan S.

customer_reviews.title: Washin Balls
customer_reviews.text: Very good idea, I keep it in my pocket and it does a good job keeping it white. One thing I would note is the outside is not water proof so if you put too much water inside it will leak through and get your pocket wet. So don't get it too wet, just a couple ozs.
customer_reviews.author: JI

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for cleaning golf balls when on the green.
customer_reviews.author: ZC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a greenside ball cleaner for awhile. Tried a few things including Ballzee. This one is way better. Ballzee smears the dirt, ProActive Pocket Ball Washer stays wet and cleans the ball every time. Played Saturday at 11AM and was wet still the next day at 9:30AM for my next round.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wonder if you put a ring to be hooked with a velt.
customer_reviews.author: Yuichi Morita

product_meta.title: ProActive Sports Green Go Pocket Ball Washer
product_meta.description: Never forget your towel at the green or putt with a dirty ball again. Wet the microfiber liner of the Green-Go and slip it into your pocket. Stays wet the entire round no matter what the temperature, while your pocket stays dry. Made from a waterproof outer material that is so comfortable you'll forget that it's there. Washable.
feature_bullets: Microfiber liner cleans your ball easily & effectively
Waterproof material remains wet on the inside and dry on the outside the whole round
Available in black, red, blue, orange, and pink
